channel.title: Unable to connect
channel.description:
I've read many topics about this and can't seem to find the answer. So i guess this is my last option.
So the error is... I can't connect using my No-IP Address. Using 127.0.0.0 and 0.0.0.0 is perfectly fine but using my No-IP address doesn't work at all. So i tried opening my ports in my firewalls and port forwarding (which was already done just redid it). Then i tried again but it didn't work. I tried renewing my No-IP address. Still didn't work. AFTER ALL THAT WORK I was able to accomplish one small thing. When the server is turned on my Runelocus status checker would say it's online!! I would a receive a connection my my status checker but for some reason I still couldn't connect. The client works fine. I tested it on other 508 servers (Mine is also 508). So I know it isn't my client. My firewalls are all allowing port 43594 and my router is open. I have no idea how to fix it. If ANY of you have any ideas please post.
There is also an error i get when i try to connect.
error_game_Js5connect
Many posts say that this error is caused because the server is offline. But MY server was online. I ran it AFTER I turned on the server. My status checker even confirms it's online so I'm pretty sure it is online 100%. I ran my server before the no-ip worked before as well. Just for some reason yesterday it got busted.
So if anyone knows how to fix or may know how to fix PLEASE post.
Thanks

item.title: Unable to connect
item.dc:creator: @Vusta Vusta
item.description:
@Vusta wrote:

Awesome thanks. Got any idea how to fix this?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 11, 2009, 12:27:43 pm[/size][hr]I’ve added you and still no response? Okay… Also does anyone else know how to fix?

item.title: Unable to connect
item.dc:creator: @Vusta Vusta
item.description:
@Vusta wrote:

I’ve read many topics about this and can’t seem to find the answer. So i guess this is my last option.

So the error is… I can’t connect using my No-IP Address. Using 127.0.0.0 and 0.0.0.0 is perfectly fine but using my No-IP address doesn’t work at all. So i tried opening my ports in my firewalls and port forwarding (which was already done just redid it). Then i tried again but it didn’t work. I tried renewing my No-IP address. Still didn’t work. AFTER ALL THAT WORK I was able to accomplish one small thing. When the server is turned on my Runelocus status checker would say it’s online!! I would a receive a connection my my status checker but for some reason I still couldn’t connect. The client works fine. I tested it on other 508 servers (Mine is also 508). So I know it isn’t my client. My firewalls are all allowing port 43594 and my router is open. I have no idea how to fix it. If ANY of you have any ideas please post.

There is also an error i get when i try to connect.

error_game_Js5connect

Many posts say that this error is caused because the server is offline. But MY server was online. I ran it AFTER I turned on the server. My status checker even confirms it’s online so I’m pretty sure it is online 100%. I ran my server before the no-ip worked before as well. Just for some reason yesterday it got busted.

So if anyone knows how to fix or may know how to fix PLEASE post.
